PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-06522022-06-10,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ESDC
ActCanada Student Financial Assistance Act
Apprentice Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Apprentice Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPRENTICE LOANS REGULATIONS in order to (1) amend the definitions of permanent disability and severe permanent disability; (2) add a new definition for persistent or prolonged disability; and (3) add borrowers with a persistent or prolonged disability as an eligible group for the Repayment Assistance Plan for Borrowers with Disabilities.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0133 Publication Date: 2022-06-22
AttachmentsAttachment
